All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
A generic Data Access Object class for interacting with the database.
Bill
A bill is tied to an order and contains information about the client and the product.
BillBLL
This class provides business logic for managing bills in the application.
BillDAO
This class is a Data Access Object thta provides an interface for CRUd operations on Bill objects within a database.
Client
Class for representing a client with unique id, name, phone and email.
ClientBLL
This class provides business logic for managing clients in the application.
ClientController
The ClientController class provides CRUD functionalities for clients and manages the user interface with the Client-view.
ClientDAO
This class is a Data Access Object thta provides an interface for CRUd operations on Client objects within a database.
ConnectionFactory
A factory class for managing database connections.
Order
Represents an order in the application.
OrderBLL
This class provides business logic for managing orders in the application.
OrderController
The controller class responsible for managing the order-related operations
OrderDAO
This class is a Data Access Object thta provides an interface for CRUd operations on Order objects within a database.
OrdersManagement
The main class for the Orders Management JavaFX application.
Product
Represents a product in the inventory system.
ProductBLL
This class provides business logic for managing products in the application.
ProductController
This class manages the product-related CRUD operations in the application.
ProductDAO
This class is a Data Access Object thta provides an interface for CRUd operations on Product objects within a database.
WindowController
This class represents a controller for the main window of the application in JavaFX.
